source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT FORMAT(COUNT_BIG(1),'#,0') as [Records Count]  FROM  Fintaxtransaction WITH (NOLOCK)

SELECT 
   Year([Invoice Date]) AS InvoiceYear,
   F.location AS [State],
   F.Industry AS Industry, 
   FORMAT(AVG([Item Price]),'#,0') AS AvgItemPrice,
   FORMAT(AVG([Item Discount]),'#,0') AS AvgItemDiscount,
   AVG([Item VAT %]) AS [AvgItemVAT%],
   FORMAT(AVG([Item VAT]),'#,0') AS AvgItemVAT,
   FORMAT(AVG([Item Net Price]),'#,0') AS AvgItemNetPrice,
   F.[Invoice Name] AS Source,
   S.id AS SourceId,
   A.id AS LocationId,
   I.id AS IndustryId
 
FROM
   dbo.Fintaxtransaction F (NOLOCK)
   INNER JOIN
		(SELECT
            ID, [Sold-To State]
         FROM dbo.Location) A  ON F.[location] = A.[Sold-To State] 
   INNER JOIN
		(SELECT
            ID, [Name] 
         FROM dbo.Source) S ON F.[Invoice Name] = S.[Name]
   INNER JOIN
		(SELECT
            ID, [Sector]
         FROM dbo.Industry) I ON F.Industry = I.[Sector] 
GROUP BY
   F.location,
   F.Industry,
   Year([Invoice Date]),
   F.[Invoice Name],
   S.ID,
   A.ID,
   I.ID
HAVING
   Year([Invoice Date]) > 2019
ORDER BY
   Year([Invoice Date]),
   F.location,
   F.Industry
